properties.value: The dragon kiteshield (g) is a dragon kiteshield with a dragon kiteshield ornament kit attached to it, and is a part of dragon gold-trimmed armour. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the kiteshield. It costs 48,290,324 for both the parts to make the dragon kiteshield (g).

The dragon kiteshield (g) is a dragon kiteshield with a dragon kiteshield ornament kit attached to it, and is a part of dragon gold-trimmed armour. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the kiteshield. It costs 48,290,324 for both the parts to make the dragon kiteshield (g).

While the kiteshield is untradeable in its ornamented state, it can be dismantled anytime, returning the tradeable kiteshield and ornament kit.

[[File:Dragon kiteshield (g) detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''dragon kiteshield (g)''' is a [[dragon kiteshield]] with a [[dragon kiteshield ornament kit]] attached to it, and is a part of [[dragon gold-trimmed armour]]. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the kiteshield. It costs {{Coins|{{GEP|Dragon kiteshield}}+{{GEP|Dragon kiteshield ornament kit}}}} for both the parts to make the dragon kiteshield (g).

While the kiteshield is untradeable in its ornamented state, it can be dismantled anytime, returning the tradeable kiteshield and ornament kit.
